goal: The worldwide news about Williams Syndrome, delivered directly to your inbox every week.
no_bullshit: Free. No Spam. Weekly (at most). Delivered directly to your inbox. Unsubscribe at any time.
curated_by: Curated by Aymerick / @aymerick, father of Luka, a little boy with Williams Syndrome.
inspired_by: Concept and design borrowed from Owain Williams's awesome Ember.js weekly newsletter.
